articles.title: It's all 'Trump and guns'
articles.description: The mom of a slain Army veteran slammed Democrats for "marching to the same drumbeat" of "Trump and guns" while ignoring crime victims Tuesday -- a day after her fiery testimony before lawmakers about Manhattan DA Alvin Bragg's soft-on-crime tactics.

articles.title: Texas Republican endorses Trump following meeting with DeSantis
articles.description: Rep. Lance Gooden (R-Texas) announced on Tuesday that he is endorsing former President Trump for the GOP nomination for president in 2024 following a meeting with Florida Gov.
